text: Which refractive state best describes a patient whose far point is at -50 cm from the principal plane?
rationale: Vergence at far point = -1/0.50 m = -2.00 D → myopia.

text: Which spectacle change reduces spectacle magnification for the same vertex power?
rationale: Flatter base curve and thinner lens reduce SM.

text: High-water ionic hydrogels are most prone to which deposit?
rationale: Ionic high-water hydrogels attract tear proteins.
